LegoBTLE.Constants.SIUnit module¶

class LegoBTLE.Constants.SIUnit.SIUnit[source]¶

Bases: enum.Enum

This class defines some important constants that are used to control the motors or to convert units.

ANGLE = 11¶

Für die Ansteuerung der Motoren in °.

DISTANCE2DEGREE = 57.29577951308232¶
DPS = 0.001¶
METER = 1¶
METER_PER_SEC = 0.001¶
MILLIMETER = 0.001¶
ROUND = 1¶
RPS = 0.001¶
TIME = 9¶

Für die Ansteuerung der Motoren in Millisekunden.
